pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download, Analyze Clean New Jersey Car Crash Data // Download and analyze motor vehicle crash data released by the New Jersey Department of Transportation (NJDOT). The data in this package is collected through the filing of NJTR-1 form by police officers, which provide a standardized way of documenting a motor vehicle crash that occurred in New Jersey. 3 different data tables containing data on crashes, vehicles pedestrians released from 2001 to the present can be downloaded cleaned using this package.
